alert.note: Alert for Canon City Vicinity, Eastern Fremont County; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 6:06PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Fremont and northwestern Pueblo Counties through 630 PM MDT... At 605 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Florence, or 20 miles north of Junkins Burn Scar, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Torrential rainfall, winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Penrose around 610 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Canon City Vicinity, Eastern Fremont County; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet
